intro.title: Hello, my name is Denis Karazan
intro.description_1: I can develop websites and web applications from scratch.
intro.description_2: I have experience managing a team and working as a team.
intro.description_3: I'm constantly developing in the field of web development.

job.more_info_1: Working with the browser extension and frontend widgets. Creating new microservices. Developing features for monitoring products, and optimizing queries in MongoDB. I actively sought and implemented solutions to enhance system resilience. Constructed Grafana dashboards through ETL processes. Optimized builds by reducing unnecessary code and replacing images. Updating projects (libraries, Webpack, Node.js, React, manifest). Reducing costs. Gathered metrics using Prometheus. And contributed to documentation and testing
job.more_info_2: CRM support and refactoring. Creating new layouts for website redesign. Developing a dedicated “Expenses” page with analytics for CRM. Efficient backlog cleanup for an external company. Working with the Mapbox interactive map. Supporting and developing widgets and components for a website builder. Embedding widgets on client websites. Maintaining CRM for website builder administration, and creating a mobile version of CRM for seamless post administration (similar to Tinder)
job.more_info_3: Technical maintenance, repair, and troubleshooting of the ice cream production line. Monitoring parameters, adjusting electronic components and equipment blocks, conducting test checks. Ensuring proper and uninterrupted operation of industrial Domino printers
job.more_info_4: Diagnosing, analyzing, repairing, and servicing industrial electronics. Ensuring uninterrupted operation of automated production lines. Diagnosing PLC Siemens controller programs. Reading and creating electrical schematics. Managing parameters of complex industrial equipment (flow meters, pressure transducers, frequency converters, etc.)

project.description_1: Working with the browser extension, maintaining and creating microservices
project.description_2: Creating a widget for the site-builder and working with admin CRM
project.description_3: Creating a page of costs and schedules for costs
project.description_4: Working with the map and data on it and troubleshooting
project.description_5: Final training project, teamwork and work with websockets
project.description_6: Creating a backend, working with CRUD and creating the entire application
project.description_7: Working with TypeScript and creating the entire application
project.description_8: Creation of the entire landing page and site logic

certificate.course_1: Faculty of Automated and Information Technologies
certificate.more_info_1: GSTU named after Pavel Sukhoi. Specialist / Engineer in radio electronics

footer.priority: Prior to collaboration, it's essential to acknowledge that, as a seasoned web developer, I'm unable to accommodate “urgent tasks” or engage in projects of a duration shorter than a day. My focus is on cultivating enduring partnerships rather than pursuing quick, short-term gains

about.title: About me
about.description: I'm an honest and responsible person. I get along well with people. I treat my work with maximum efficiency. I'm engaged in self-study. My first encounter with JavaScript was in June 2020. For me, technology is a tool
